content.rendered:
AUTOMAX 4×4 is your one stop shop for 4×4 accessories in coffs harbour

Automax Service Centre began in 2012 and quickly grew into a trusted local mechanical workshop favoured by many Coffs Harbour and out of town clients. As the clientele grew it quickly became obvious the 4WD scene was extremely popular in the Coffs Coast region and with such amazing offroad tracks and hidden beaches how could it not be.

2019 saw Automax 4X4 develop into its own right with the hope of offering our existing and potential clients a complete one stop shop experience. With a growing 4X4 accessories showroom, trained staff and onsite fitting, Automax 4X4 can fit out your vehicle to hit the tracks and get exploring.

Automax 4X4 has an exceptional range of bullbars from leading suppliers such as Rhino 4X4, Rival by Drivetech, Rockarmor, AFN and is a fitting centre for many other brands. We can upgrade your suspension with the always popular Outback Armour, give you a lift with Boss Airbags, or the ultimate lift with The Ultimate Suspension. Why not add bigger wheels with a wheel and tyre package and make your ultimate lift even higher. We have a large range of LED lightbars and spot lights on display thanks to Stedi, auto electrical services including Tow-Pro fitting and are now offering Roo Systems ECU remapping and exhaust systems.

Head on down to Automax 4X4 and speak to the team about kitting out your rig with the latest 4X4 accessories.

Shop Online
